divs: Sighting Details I WAS DRIVING HOME FROM WORK ON HIGHWAY 60 HEADING SOUTH WHEN I SAW THE OBJECT OUT OF THE CORNER OF MY EYE . I PULLED OFF THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AT THE INTERSECTION OF HIGHWAY 60 AND FM521 AND QUICKLY TOOK TWO PICTURES OF IT . THEN THE OBJECT SEEMED TO DISAPPEAR . I LOOKED AT MY PHNES CLOCK AND IT WAS EXACTLY 7:39 PM I PULLED BACK ONTO THE ROAD AND CONTINUED DOWN HIGHWAY 60 LOOKING AROUND BUT NOT SEEING ANYTHING . RIGHT WHEN I REACED C.R.242 I SPOTTED THE OBJECT AGAIN BUT IT DISAPPEARED BEFORE I COULD PULL OVER . I PROCEEDED HOME AND WHEN I GOT OUT OF THE CAR I SEARCHED THE SKY BUT I SAW NO TRACE OF IT . I HAVE BEEN TRYING TO EXPORT THE TWO PHOTOS FROM MY PHONE TO MY E MAIL BUT IT WILL NOT WORK FOR SOME REASON . I WILL TRY TO CONTACT MY CARRIER TOMARROW AND RESOLVE THIS SO I CAN POST THE PHOTOS FOR YOU TO SEE .
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bay City
There were no other sightings in Bay City on or around September 8th 2011
Summary: I SAW IT AGAIN AND THIS TIME I GOT PICTURES
